Hi Elizabeth,
 
I'm sorry to have to tell you this , but getting a Frank's=
 box or building one is just about impossible.
Frank builds these boxes by =
hand and it is a very time consuming and tedious job, but for him a 
labor =
of love. So he periodically gives a box to someone of his choosing without =
giving reason.
 
No one has ever bought a Frank's box for the simple reason=
 that mr. Sumption refuses to accept any money for his boxes.
There are onl=
y about ten people in the world, beside mr. sumption that own a Frank's box=
.
How ever there are alternative boxes that work on the same premise and pr=
oduce the same type of real time live communication
that Frank's box does.
=

If you decide to try this method, please let me know I will be glad to hel=
p.
Bruce
 
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: mu5tangcircle=
@...: Tue, 8 Apr 2008 06:26:06 -0700Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Th=
e RS hacks!





Mis.Lyn told me about his group. Thanks Lyn! I want to bui=
ld my own Franks Box but I think it is going to be more difficult than I th=
ought.
 Leslie took my digital recorder to the basment to leave it there wh=
ile she was at work. I am listening to it while I type. We have had a probl=
em with her little boy ghost Robert only whispering when he answers questio=
ns. At the begining of the recording I heard her ask Robert to speak up and=
 talk louder LOL!!! I have heard what sounds like a box being shoved across=
 the floor. I will have to show her this.Nobody is at home while this recor=
ding is going on.
Hugs,ElizabethZack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:


H=
i Elizabeth,AHA! You appear here, too!:-)No, I haven't done that yet. I dug=
 thru my junquebox of electronic parts to gather together what I needed to =
make one, but didn't have a few parts and never got around to ordering them=
. Maybe one of these days, I hope ...ZackOn Tue, 8 Apr 2008, Elizabeth Rett=
ig wrote:> Zack, have you ever made your own Franks box?> Elizabeth>> Zack =
Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:>> I'm sure there are lots of Radio Shack=
s out in the boonies that have a few> in stock that aren't going to get peo=
ple coming in to buy them to hack. I> can think of a dozen fairly small tow=
ns around here that have Radio Shacks> and probably no people around with p=
aranormal interests.>> Zack>> On Tue, 8 Apr 2008, LC Duplatt wrote:>>> LOL!=
 Well, I guess the deal will be on eBay, Frank. Just kidding...>>>> LC>>


=
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster To=
tal Access, No Cost.
